command.name: ps
command.args: -ef | egrep 'amqzlaa0|amqrmppa' | grep -v grep | awk '{ print $2 }' | xargs -I {} pmap -x {}

command.name: ps
command.args: -ef | grep 'mq' | grep -v grep | awk '{ print $2 }' | xargs -I {} strings -f /proc/{}/environ

command.name: ps
command.args: -ef | egrep 'amqzlaa0|amqrmppa' | grep -v grep | awk '{ print $2 }' | xargs -I {} pmap -x {}

command.name: ps
command.args: -ef | grep 'mq' | grep -v grep | awk '{ print $2 }' | xargs -I {} ps -p {} -wwwE

command.name: ps
command.args: -ef | egrep 'amqzlaa0|amqrmppa' | grep -v grep | awk '{ print $2 }' | xargs -I {} vmmap {}

command.name: ps
command.args: -ef | grep 'mq' | grep -v grep | awk '{ print $2 }' | xargs -I {} pargs -e {}

command.name: ps
command.args: -ef | egrep 'amqzlaa0|amqrmppa' | grep -v grep | awk '{ print $2 }' | xargs -I {} pmap -x {}

command.name: ps
command.args: -ef | grep 'mq' | grep -v grep | awk '{ print $2 }' | xargs -I {} ps eww {}

command.name: ps
command.args: -ef | egrep 'amqzlaa0|amqrmppa' | grep -v grep | awk '{ print $2 }' | xargs -I {} procmap -X {}

command.name: if
command.args: not defined PROCESSOR_ARCHITEW6432 (tasklist /m) else echo Skipping tasklist as running in WOW

command.name: echo
command.args: DIS CHS(*) CHLTYPE(MQTT) CLIENTID(*) ALL | "MQBIN::\runmqsc" QM::

command.name: echo
command.args: DIS CHS(*) CHLTYPE(AMQP) CLIENTID(*) ALL | "MQBIN::\runmqsc" QM::
